meanings.definition: A covered walkway in ancient Greece, used for exercise or sports.
meanings.sent1: The xystoi provided shade for athletes during their workouts.
meanings.sent2: The athletes jogged along the xystoi to warm up before the race.
meanings.sent3: The playful dog thought the xystoi was a perfect spot for a game of fetch.
meanings.sent4: The vines twisted around the xystoi columns like nature's own workout equipment.
meanings.sent5: The sound of footsteps echoed through the xystoi, creating a rhythmic atmosphere for exercise.

meanings.definition: A type of ancient Greek portico or colonnade.
meanings.sent1: The grand xystoi entrance welcomed visitors to the temple.
meanings.sent2: The marble columns of the xystoi gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The birds perched on the xystoi, enjoying the view from above.
meanings.sent4: The shadows cast by the xystoi created a cool retreat from the heat.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the xystoi told stories of ancient heroes and gods.

meanings.definition: A type of ancient Greek building used for athletic exercises.
meanings.sent1: The athletes gathered in the xystoi to prepare for the competition.
meanings.sent2: The xystoi was equipped with everything needed for a successful training session.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous students turned the xystoi into a makeshift obstacle course.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight streamed through the windows of the xystoi, illuminating the exercise equipment.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the crowd echoed within the walls of the xystoi, spurring the athletes on to victory.
